ComicInfo.Summary: The Black God Urizen had been encased in stone and his hand stood out of the ground. Preston Miller and his mischievous brothers were playing near The Devilâ€™s Right Hand when he fell on a sharp piece of stone.He sees a vision of evil and the stone possesses his very being. Preston is anxious to share his new power with his twin brothers. When the boys abduct young Mikey Maloy on Halloween night, they cross a line that forces Spawn to get involved. Unknown to him the boy is possessed by The Dark God Urizen himself, luckily Spawn manages to free the boy of his grasp. All the while Overt'kill is on the loose again.
ComicInfo.Title: Cautionary Tales - Part III
